name: Commune Corvidae
description:
Returning home as the descendant of a long-deposed leader, you explore what has become of your family's old domain. Though the scars of your ancestors' influence remain, the community has turned away from the past toward a hopeful future.

  • Explore your rebuilt homeland above the clouds by climbing almost any surface and effortlessly gliding through the air
  • Listen to the stories of the folks who remain here and how they have recovered and restored their society
  • Visit the sites of the neglected pilgrimage of a long-forgotten faith
  • Discover the secrets of a recovering populace and the strength of a community
